Html: Hello rawr, I have been using rawr for over 2 years now and I congratulate all of you for a brilliant piece of work the addon for wow is fantastic too. My computer died on me and I had to replace my hard drive. I was using rawr via elitist jerks originally . Following the links and installing silverlight has become a nightmare. I keep installing silverlight exe, silverlight 5 and minefield of other silverlight stuff that i have no idea what they do or meant relevant to rawr. Can you please help a fool to find the right download and any bits that go with it to start rawr on Elitists web page. I suspect you all work extremely hard in developing rawr for idiots like myself who are not computer literate, but I do so enjoy what you have developed and feel naked without rawr.  Any help will be greatly apreciated.

Sorry for not getting back to you sooner. Are you currently using Windows or Mac?

Minefield...As in Firefox's beta for Firefox?

If so then try using the normal Firefox (I know it works fine in my current version of Firefox).

If you ware using Windows, you maybe running the incorrect version.

Are you using 32-bit Windows or 64-bit. If you don't know go "Start"; Right-click "My Computer" or "Computer" depending the type of Windows you are running; then "Properties." The "System Type" will tell you if you are using 32-bit or 64-bit.

32-bit Silverlight 5 - http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229323

64-bit Silverlight 5 - http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229324

If you are using Mac - http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229325

If you are STILL having issues, try Silverlight 4 - http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=149156&v=4.0

 

Rawr was originally designed for Silverlight 4 but is backwards compatible in Silverlight 5. Try the links above. If those don't work let us know.

Hello Hinalover, thx for your reply. Didnt give you the details of my computer but you seem to have covered it all above. For the info its a 32-bit windows vista. I am running fire fox and will post you my success once I have downloaded the 32-bit silverlight 5 link. once again thx.

Hello again, its been a while since I said I would post my success.....well i wasnt having any success until i remembered I downloaded the WPF 4.3.8 file many months ago. I removed that now and got rawr to load YAY!!  I am whole again. Success to you and all the rawr team. Great work!
